articles.title: Kenya's Presidential Election: Live Updates and News
articles.description: All eyes are on the presidential election in the bellwether East African nation — a test for democracy and a race that is too close to call.
articles.content:
Voting in Nairobi on Tuesday.Credit...Luis Tato/Agence France-Presse Getty Images

articles.author: Maggie Haberman, Ben Protess, Adam Goldman
articles.title: F.B.I. Searches Trump’s Mar-a-Lago Residence in Florida
articles.description: The former president called the search an “assault” and complained that the authorities had broken into a safe. The news appeared to come as a surprise to top aides at the White House.
articles.content: Former President Donald J. Trump said on Monday that the F.B.I. had searched his Palm Beach, Fla., home and had broken open a safe an account signaling a major escalation in the various investigation… [+9680 chars]

articles.title: Taiwanese foreign minister says China drills part of a game-plan for invasion
articles.description: Taiwan's foreign minister said on Tuesday that China was using the military drills it launched in protest against U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's visit as a game-plan to prepare for an invasion of the self-ruled island.
articles.content: TAIPEI, Aug 9 (Reuters) - Taiwan's foreign minister said on Tuesday that China was using the military drills it launched in protest against U.S. House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's visit as a game-plan to p… [+4918 chars]

articles.author: Oren Liebermann, CNN
articles.title: Pentagon acknowledges sending previously undisclosed anti-radar missiles to Ukraine
articles.description: The Pentagon announced Monday that the US has sent anti-radar missiles for Ukrainian aircraft to target Russian radar systems, marking the first time the Defense Department has acknowledged sending the previously undisclosed missile to Ukraine.
articles.content: (CNN)The Pentagon announced Monday that the US has sent anti-radar missiles for Ukrainian aircraft to target Russian radar systems, marking the first time the Defense Department has acknowledged send… [+2787 chars]

articles.author: CBSLA Staff
articles.title: Houston nurse Nicole Linton charged with murder, gross vehicular manslaughter in Windsor Hills crash that killed 6
articles.description: Nicole Lorraine Linton, 37, was behind the wheel of a Mercedes-Benz that barreled through a red light at Slauson and La Brea avenues last Thursday and slammed to several other vehicles in the Windsor Hills area, according to the CHP.
articles.content: A nurse from Houston was charged Monday with six counts of murder and five counts of gross vehicular manslaughter for the fiery crash that killed six people, including an infant and a pregnant woman.… [+2555 chars]

articles.author: Stefanie Dazio
articles.title: Albuquerque killings send fear through Islamic communities
articles.description: Authorities on Monday identified the fourth victim in a series of killings of Muslim men in Albuquerque, New Mexico, as the deaths sent ripples of fear through Islamic communities nationwide. Three of the slayings happened in the last two weeks.

articles.title: Maps in Four States Were Ruled Illegal Gerrymanders. They’re Being Used Anyway.
